name: Chronos battle station
description:
Use time disruption fields to protect the convoy.

Left click for slowdown bomb
Right click for speedup bomb
Press "S" for restart mission

The gray color in the crosshair indicates that the station is recharging, wait until turns blue.

Created for Kenney Jam 2018

Thanks for playing and thanks to Kenney for so many high quality resources.

Music

"Hiding Your Reality" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
